attributes.action: Stop rewarding parents who have no intentions of working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If unemployed and claiming benefits for over 12 months, payments for any additional children born after this 12 month period should not be payable.This is an ever increasing burden to the taxpayer when in fact the burden should lie with the mother AND the father.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
